<js>
var text = "";
var mat = result.match(/var chapterContent = "([^"]*?)";/);
if(mat){
text = mat[1];
}
unescape(text.replace(/\\/g,'%'))
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var pageNum=1;
var mat=src.match(/"total_page":(\d+)/);
if(mat){
pageNum=mat[1];
}
var list = [];
var bid = java.get("bid");
for(var i=2;i<=pageNum;i++){
var body = "bid="+bid+"&page_size=50&page="+i;
var option={"charset": "utf-8","method": "POST","body": String(body)};
var url = "https://book.sina.cn/dpool/newbook/bookv1/ajax/get_catalog.php"+","+JSON.stringify(option);
list.push(url);
}
list
</js>

}

if(title.match(/\.doc|\.xls|\.pdf/)){ h=java.getString("@@class.doc-content@html"); if(h==""){ data=result.match(/pureViewPageData = (\{[\s\S]+?\}) \|\|/)[1]; json=JSON.parse(data); list=json.readerInfo2019.htmlUrls.json; png=json.readerInfo2019.htmlUrls.png; h=""; for(i in list){ html=java.ajax(list[i].pageLoadUrl); $=html.match(/wenku_\d+\(([\s\S]+)\)/)[1]; $=JSON.parse($); list2=$.body; for(j in list2){ if(String(list2[j].c).match(/^\s{1,5}$/)){ c="
" }else{ c=list2[j].c } if(list2[j].t=="pic"){ c='' } h+=c } h+="
